details.description_text: Sleeve Type: Half, Fit Type: Regular Closure Type: Button. Solid Polo, Vibrant Colours Package Content: 3 Pcs T-Shirts Pack Cotton half sleeve polos for men are a versatile and stylish clothing option that can be dressed up or down. They are made from a soft, breathable fabric that is perfect for warm weather. polos also have a slightly textured surface that gives them a unique look and feel. This polo is perfect for the young and smart person. It is normally associated with collar and placket with typically two or three buttons, and an optional pocket. A dress-length version of the shirt is called a polo dress. It is made of cotton fabrics. This polo will make a fashion conscious person like you smarter than ever. It is comfortable during your workout and is easy to clean.
